page-not-found: The page you are looking for couldn't be found.
logout-message: Are you sure you want to log out?
verify-email: Please verify your email to continue.
unk-error-login: Error logging in. Please try again.
unk-error-forgot-password: Error processing your request. Please try again.
forgot-password-message: Enter the email address you used to register and we will send a link to reset your password.
password-short: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
subdomain-hint: Choose your subdomain. Ex: fortmea will be fortmea.e-um.dev.br
target-hint: This is the IP or address that your subdomain will point to. For example, 8.8.8.8 (using A record type) or fortmea.github.io (using CNAME).
delete-message:
Delete subdomain?
This action cannot be undone.
no-domain-registered: You have no domains registered. Please, start by registering your first subdomain below.
ip-invalid: Invalid IP Address. If you are entering a subdomain, please select CNAME as your record type.
cname-invalid: Invalid Target subdomain. If you are entering an IP Address, please select A as your record type.
error-registering: Error registering your subdomain. Please check the form for errors, if the problems persist check the questions or help page.
error-deleting: Error deleting your subdomain. Please try again later. If the issue persists, contact us through the help section.
claim-now: Login to claim your free subdomain now.
delete-account-message:
Are you sure?
This action is irreversible and immediate. All domains registered will be removed along with your user data.
privacy-policy-terms-use: Privacy policy and terms of use
privacy-policy-terms-use-description: You can find them through the links below:
what-domain-description: A subdomain is a part of the url for subdomain.com. For example, if you have a subdomain named "example.com" and you want to register a subdomain called "subdomain", the url would be "subdomain.example.com".
why-use-description: If you need a place for your website or web app to be hosted, you can use this service to get your own subdomain for free. It works with vercel and many different service providers.
how-to-delete-description: Use the button below to delete your account.
a-cname-description:
An A record is a record that points to an IP address. It is used for DNS lookups and is the most common type of DNS record.
 A CNAME record is a record that points to another subdomain name. It is used for aliasing and is often used to point to an S3 bucket, CloudFront distribution or other service.
copyright-dmca-claims-description:
Email this address to claim ownership of content hosted in subdomains registered through this service:
 eu@jao.su
